metadata.dc:author: Lacadena, J R
metadata.dc:description: Human cell therapy based on tissue transplantation can become an important tool in Medicine. In the last years, experimental evidence has proved that it could be possible to produce human tissue cultures derived from embryonic stem (ES) cells which are pluripotents. The topic is discussed from the scientific, ethical and legal points of view.
metadata.dc:title: Embriones humanos y cultivos de tejidos: reflexiones científicas, éticas y jurídicas.
[Human embryos and tissue cultures: scientific, ethical and legal reflections].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de derecho y genoma humano = Law and the human genome review
